name: The Great Fire
description:
A strategy game based on The Great Fire of London.

Demolish buildings to prevent the spread of fire, and extinguish buildings to slow the flames down.

Rules:

- Fire spreads to adjacent houses.

- To prevent fire from spreading further you must strategically destroy houses that surround the house which is on fire.

- You can use water to put out houses to slow down the spread of fire.
- In order to pass a level, a certain number of houses must remain.
- You can only destroy / put out a certain number of houses at a time.

Controls:
- Left click: Demolish house (house mustn't be on fire)
- Right click: Extinguish fire (uses water)
